pull.title: Split logic to undo txin's off DisconnectBlock.
pull.body:
Instead, create a separate function that applies the undo operation of a CTxInUndo object onto a CCoinsViewCache.  This method is used from DisconnectBlock.

This is a rebased version of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/5192.  I had to re-submit it, since the old pull request does no longer pick up changes.  The reason for that is that namecoin/namecoin was changed to be no longer a fork of bitcoin/bitcoin, and the old pull request was done via domob1812/namecoin (forked from namecoin/namecoin).

events.body: Rebased.  Can this be merged, or is there anything I still have to do?
utACK apart from the above nit

events.message:
Split logic to undo txin's off DisconnectBlock.

Instead, create a separate function that applies the undo operation of a
CTxInUndo object onto a CCoinsViewCache.  This method is used from
DisconnectBlock.

events.body: ACK, verfied code moves only apart from some error() message changes.

comments.body: Change the DisconnectBlock() to ApplyTxInUndo() (or even better, replace it with %s: with **FILE**).
